thread.title: Ethnic styles melded with sleek design are themes for Giorgio Armani fall-winter collection

title: Ethnic styles melded with sleek design are themes for Giorgio Armani fall-winter collection
text:
Ethnic styles melded with sleek design are themes for Giorgio Armani fall-winter collection   01:47 
Italian fashion duo presented smooth and elegant looks including fluffy bonnet hats, long jackets with crumpled backs and knotted skirts. Rough cut (no reporter narration)
